heading: HR02220
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO LOOK INTO THE REPORTED LOW SPENDING OF OFFICIAL DEVELOPMENT ASSISTANCE (ODA) LOANS IN 2017 BY THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION IN ORDER TO APPRISE MEMBERS OF THIS CHAMBER THE STATUS OF THE AFFECTED PROJECT AS WELL AS TO CLARIFY THE REASON BEHIND THE DELAY OF THE UNUSED ASSISTANCE LOANS IMPEDING THE COUNTRY'S GROWTH AND NATIONAL DEVELOPMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-10-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02220
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO LOOK INTO THE REPORTED LOW SPENDING OF OFFICIAL DEVELOPMENT ASSISTANCE (ODA) LOANS IN 2017 BY THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION IN ORDER TO APPRISE MEMBERS OF THIS CHAMBER THE STATUS OF THE AFFECTED PROJECT AS WELL AS TO CLARIFY THE REASON BEHIND THE DELAY OF THE UNUSED ASSISTANCE LOANS IMPEDING THE COUNTRY'S GROWTH AND NATIONAL DEVELOPMENT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-10-03
